refran: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.
author: Isaac Newton

refran: Be not afraid of going slowly. Be afraid only of standing still.
author: Chinese proverb

refran: Earning happiness means doing good and working, not speculating and being lazy. Laziness may look inviting, but only work gives you true satisfaction.
author: Anne Frank

refran: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
author: Abraham Lincoln

refran: Before you diagnose yourself with depression or low self-esteem, first make sure you are not, in fact, surrounded by assholes.
author: Sigmund Freud

refran: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
author: Albert Einstein
